sections.description:
Live Demo | Live Chat | Support

Overview

WordPress Testimonial Plugin will display client’s testimonial, review or quote in multiple ways by using the shortcode: [hm_testimonial]

🌟 Plugin Features:

  • Easy to install
  • Fully integrated in WordPress
  • Fully responsive for any device
  • Shortcoded
  • Simple but effective
  • Custom Post Type
  • Unlimited Testimonials
  • Show-Hide a testimonial
  • Display testimonials by category
  • Two type of animation: Slide / Fade
  • Star rating for reviewer
  • Font Awesome integrated
  • Slider autoplay on/off
  • Navigation icon color option
  • Navigation hover bg color option
  • Pagination color option
  • Pagination active color option
  • Order By Option
  • Two theme available
  • Clean UI

➡️ Useage of Shortcode:⬅️

Use the below Shortcode to display Testimonials 

 [hm_testimonial]

 [hm_testimonial category='Client']

sections.installation:
Install HM Testimonial as a regular WordPress plugin. Here are different ways to install plugin:

Install by search plugin:

  1. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
  2. Search HM Testimonial
  3. Click to install
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. Setup the proper settings in HM Testimonial menu

Install by upload plugin:

  1. Download the latest version of HM Testimonial (.zip file)
  2. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
  3. Select “Upload Plugin”
  4. Click on “Choose File”
  5. Select downloaded hm-testimonial.zip and click on “Install Now” button
  6. Activate the plugin
sections.faq:
How can I Display Testimonials?

After activating the plugin, you will see “HM Testimonial” in WordPress Admin Dashboard.

Go to “Add New” and add your testimonials as many as you want.

Now create a page and insert the shortode [hm_testimonial] through TinyMCE editor and update.
